initializer.source:
{
            orderId: uuid:createType1AsString(),
            email: item.email,
            itemId: item.itemId,
            requiredCount: item.quantity,
            succeedPayment: item.succeedPayment,
            succeedDispatch: item.succeedDispatch
        }
